Medium: Illustrated book with twenty etchings (twelve with aquatint, one with heliogravure, and one with heliogravure and aquatint), one heliogravure, two zincographs, one woodcut, one aquatint wrapper, and eight reproductions; plus the supplementary suite of twelve etchings (eight with aquatint) and one aquatint
Dimensions: page (each approx.): 19 11/16 x 14 15/16" (50 x 38 cm); overall (closed): 20 1/4 x 15 3/8 x 1 3/8" (51.4 x 39 x 3.5 cm)
Title: Fautrier l'enragé
